author: djencks
msg: Move imported tx functionality towards TransactionContextManager.  Replace almost all uses of TransactionContext.get/setContext with methods on TransactionContextManager.  Prevent NPEs when there is no TransactionContext. This represents progress on GERONIMO-347 and GERONIMO-352
